content.prompt: Because of its complex figural reliefs, corbeled mountainlike roofs, and covered pavilions, the structure shown can be attributed to the same architectural style as that of

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.2: Purpose and Audience in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Justify an attribution of a work of art by explaining similarities with work by a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
